did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: File folders containing historical information on selected towns in the state of Connecticut.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Beardsley and Memorial Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired from various individuals and families, and compiled by Beardsley Library.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The files have been compiled by the Beardsley Library from primary and secondary sources.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The files contain historical information pertaining to selected towns in the state of Connecticut, including magazine articles, maps, newspaper articles, photographs, etc. The towns documented include: Barkhamsted, Colebrook, Cornwall, Goshen, Harwinton, Litchfield, Norfolk, Riverton, Sharon, Simsbury, Torrington, and Watertown.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are in hanging file folders are stored in a file cabinet and arranged alphabetically according to town.
